counter.name: Exalted Awareness
counter.desc: As an action, you can sense the presence of illusions and other effects designed to deceive the senses within 30 feet of you, provided that you aren’t blinded or deafened. You sense that an effect is trying to trick you, but you gain no insight into what is hidden or its true nature. Once you’ve used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.
